title: A day in the life of a Peruvian shaman - Gabriel Prieto

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.text: To increase the fish catch and provide for the village

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: To promote trade and cultural exchange with the highland communities
